DOC.brief_summary: A multi-center , open-label , randomize , two-period , crossover non-inferiority trial ass functionality female condom silicone elastomer vaginal ring .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Assess Functionality Female Condom With Silicone Elastomer Vaginal Ring
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , randomize , 2-period , crossover non-inferiority trial , conduct 4.5 month two research center USA among 81 healthy , monogamous , heterosexual , sexually active couple assess functionality female lubricate , nitrile condom vaginal intercourse presence absence silicone elastomer placebo vaginal ring .
